text: @ImranKhanPTI 🤣🤣🤣 what the hell do you smoke? Help who? You and ur country's entire existence is now a question mark and you are delusional about helping others. Just stop terror emanating from Pak, bahut ehsaan hoga aapka. Go back to your NAB & FIA World, Covid-19 is also beyond you!
